User Story: As a developer, I want to upload my build to Steamworks, so that I can see the details and make changes without difficulty.
As a new user, I want to navigate the Steamworks application easily, so that I can find the features I need.
As a project manager, I want to view the dashboard of team progress, so that I can monitor deadlines.
As a student, I want to download lecture slides, so that I can study offline.
As a customer, I want to reset my password online, so that I can regain access without calling support.
As a user, I want to access the Steamworks dashboard for key metrics and features, so that I can track performance.
As a developer, I want to have a streamlined build approval process, so that I can update my game quickly.
As a user, I want to receive notifications about updates and build status, so that I can stay informed.
As a developer, I want to customize the layout and shortcuts of the application, so that I can work efficiently.
As a user, I want to use the Steamworks application to upload builds and review them, so that I can manage my projects effectively.
As a user, I want to have a search bar for finding tools or features, so that I can locate what I need quickly.
As a user, I want to access the Steamworks application for reviews and feedback, so that I can engage with the community.
As a user, I want to have a way to prioritize builds for quicker approvals, so that I can manage my projects efficiently.
